headline: Contrast Security and Datadog Partner to Deliver Verified Application Runtime Threat Detection in Datadog Cloud SIEM
summary: PLEASANTON, Calif., December 04, 2025--Contrast Security, the leader in Application Detection and Response (ADR), and Datadog announced a new integration that brings verified application runtime intelligence directly into Datadog Cloud SIEM. The integration enables Security Operations Centers (SOCs) to distinguish real application-layer exploits from background noise and then stop those attacks.

content.title: Contrast Security and Datadog Partner to Deliver Verified Application Runtime Threat Detection in Datadog Cloud SIEM
content.summary: PLEASANTON, Calif., December 04, 2025--Contrast Security, the leader in Application Detection and Response (ADR), and Datadog announced a new integration that brings verified application runtime intelligence directly into Datadog Cloud SIEM. The integration enables Security Operations Centers (SOCs) to distinguish real application-layer exploits from background noise and then stop those attacks.

headline: Snowflake shares fall on slower product revenue growth forecast for fourth quarter
summary: Snowflake shares slumped 8% in premarket trading on Thursday after the cloud data analytics company forecast slower product ​revenue growth for the fourth quarter, partly hit by discounts offered ‌on the large, long-term deals.  Chief Executive Officer Sridhar Ramaswamy said on Wednesday that the company ‌provides more favorable pricing for larger volumes or longer-term contracts, noting that these "don't tend to have an immediate impact on revenue."  The company's shares have risen ‍over 70% so far this year.

The company's shares have risen ‍over 70% so far this year.

headline: Snowflake tumbles on slower quarterly product revenue growth forecast
summary: Snowflake shares slumped 11% on Thursday after the cloud data analytics company forecast slower product revenue growth for ​the fourth quarter, partly hit by discounts offered on the ‌large, long-term deals.  CEO Sridhar Ramaswamy said on Wednesday the company provides more favorable pricing for larger volumes or longer-term contracts, noting that these "don't tend to have ⁠an immediate impact on revenue."  Snowflake's ‌third-quarter product revenue was "undoubtedly decent" but was slightly below investor expectations after peers like Datadog, Confluent and MongoDB ‍showed impressive performance, analysts at Scotiabank said in a note.

CEO Sridhar Ramaswamy said on Wednesday the company provides more favorable pricing for larger volumes or longer-term contracts, noting that these "don't tend to have ⁠an immediate impact on revenue."  Snowflake's ‌third-quarter product revenue was "undoubtedly decent" but was slightly below investor expectations after peers like Datadog, Confluent and MongoDB ‍showed impressive performance, analysts at Scotiabank said in a note.
